ko: 나쁜 씨앗에선 나쁜 열매가 열리는 법이야.

en: I don't like bad boys.
Some think it is a bad idea.
Better be half hanged than ill wed.
ko: 불행한 결혼을 하느니 차라리 혼자 사는 게 나아.

en: Ill news comes too soon.
Ill news comes apace.
It is, not I, but you, who are to blame.
ko: 내 잘못이 아니라 바로 네 잘못이야.

en: You won't regret it.
It is you who is to blame.
It is not you but I that am to blame.
It is I that am bad.
I'm afraid you don't.
No need to worry.
Is there a problem?
You have to apologize at once when you have done wrong.
That which is evil is soon learned.
To make matter worse, the traffic was bad.
Do you think it a bad thing?
Don't you think it a bad thing?
ko: 그게 나쁜 일이라고 생각 안 해?

en: Don't be a bad boy.
I take the liberty of going home.
I'm sorry I can't go.
Sorry, but I can't go along with you.
ko: 미안하지만 같이 못 갈 것 같아.

en: I'm sorry, I have another engagement.
I really shouldn't ask, but could you go get some tofu for me?
ko: 부탁하기 좀 미안한데, 두부 좀 사다 줄 수 있어?

en: I'm sorry, but it's just not possible.
ko: 미안하지만 그건 좀 힘들 것 같아.

en: I have caught a bad cold.
Aoi dances very well.
Aoi is a very good dancer.
What a good dancer Aoi is!
How well Aoi dances!
Aoi dances well.
We never meet without a parting.
Aoi's hobby is dancing.
Aoi became a dancer.
Aoi dances.
Skip the pleasantries and get down to business.
Greetings are the basis of good manners.
I was at a loss for an answer.
Textile News has a large following among those working in the textile industry.
ko: 섬유 신문은 섬유 업계 사람들 사이에서 독자가 진짜 많아.

en: I'm dead to love.
Love is above money. The latter can't give as much happiness as the former.
ko: 사랑은 돈보다 중요해. 돈은 사랑만큼 행복을 줄 수 없거든.

en: Love blinded him to her faults.
ko: 사랑에 눈이 멀어서 걔 단점이 안 보였나 봐.

en: Burn with desire.
Love and hate are opposite emotions.
You cannot live by love alone.
It is pleasant to watch a loving old couple.
ko: 사이좋은 노부부를 보는 건 기분 좋은 일이야.

en: I parted with my old car.
Let's sing a patriotic air.
Many murders have been committed in the name of patriotism.
ko: 애국이라는 이름 아래 수많은 살인이 저질러졌어.

en: The patriots stood up for the rights of their nation.
At last, Mario managed to win the princess's love.
My pet dog was seriously ill.
Nothing is as precious as love.
Love is something that you can neither snatch away nor express.
ko: 사랑은 뺏을 수도, 말로 다 표현할 수도 없는 거야.

en: But love can break your heart.
ko: 하지만 사랑은 마음에 상처를 주기도 해.

en: Love me little, love me long.
Charity begins at home.
Ai finds it difficult to make friends with Ken.
Love undeniably has wings to fly away from love, but it's also undeniable that it also has wings to fly back.
ko: 사랑은 떠날 수도 있지만 다시 돌아올 수도 있다는 건 분명해.

en: Love, which is a wonderful feeling, comes to everyone at some time in their life.
ko: 사랑이라는 멋진 감정은 살면서 누구에게나 찾아와.

en: Love makes the world go round.
Love moves in mysterious ways.
What is life without the radiance of love?
ko: 사랑의 빛이 없는 삶이 무슨 의미가 있겠어?

en: Love and Peace.
We hope we will make our home full of love and happiness.
ko: 우리 집이 사랑과 행복으로 가득했으면 좋겠어.

en: Love is seeing her in your dreams.
ko: 사랑은 꿈속에서도 그 사람을 보는 거야.

en: I didn't marry her because I loved her.
How difficult a thing it is, to love, and to be wise, and both at once.
ko: 사랑을 하면서 동시에 현명하기란 정말 힘든 일이야.

en: It is easy to love, but hard to be loved.
ko: 사랑하는 건 쉽지만 사랑받는 건 어려워.

en: My love for you won't let me tell you everything. Some things are better left unsaid.
ko: 널 사랑해서 차마 다 말할 수가 없어. 말하지 않는 게 나은 것들도 있거든.

en: To love and to be loved is the greatest happiness.
ko: 사랑하고 사랑받는 게 가장 큰 행복이야.

en: It is the greatest happiness in life to love and to be loved.
ko: 사랑하고 사랑받는 게 인생에서 가장 큰 행복이야.

en: Don't mourn over the loss of your loved one too long.
ko: 사랑하는 사람을 잃었다고 너무 오래 슬퍼하지 마.

en: There is more pleasure in loving than in being loved.
ko: 사랑받는 것보다 사랑하는 게 더 큰 기쁨이야.

en: It is sad not to be loved, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
ko: 사랑받지 못하는 건 슬프지만 사랑할 수 없는 건 훨씬 더 슬퍼.

en: It is love that rules the world.
As long as we love each other, we'll be all right.
ko: 우리 서로 사랑하는 한 다 괜찮을 거야.

en: Faults are thick where love is thin.
ko: 사랑이 식으면 단점이 크게 보이는 법이야.

en: Love can mend your life.
ko: 사랑은 네 삶을 치유해줄 수 있어.
